# Usage
You can get stock value every month.

Edit the Ticker list near the beginning of the code.
And the execute.
get_stock_val(2024)


# Result
Output ./out.csv

Ticker	2024/1/31	2024/2/29	2024/3/29	2024/4/30	2024/5/31	2024/6/28	2024/7/31	2024/8/30	2024/9/30	2024/10/31
